events.name: DevSecOps Workshop - AWS, Terraform, Docker and Spinnaker
events.description:
We are pleased to inform DevSecOps Hands-On workshop on DevSecOps by Mohammed A. Imran aka secfigo.  


Please note, this is an invite only but FREE  hands-on workshop, we can accommodate only few selected participants. If you get selected, you will receive email from humla champion a week before the workshop. *** We are looking for more speakers to contribute to this series. Please get in touch if you are interested. 



Selection Criteria: Selection (25-30 persons only) will be based on the following two criteria: 1. Contribution to the community. Speakers, humla, bachav champions, core team, volunteers  and venue hosts will get priority to the workshop.  2. Passion towards Information security + attendance in previous meet ups.   If you are new to the community, selection will be based on the answers to the survey questions asked during the registration process. Please answer these questions carefully. 


Agenda:  In this workshop we will discuss the following 1) What is DevSecOps 2) What is not DevSecOps 3) Process, tools and techniques 4) Tools covered  1.  Ansible 2. Docker 3. Spinnaker 4. AWS 



Who should attend ? : Anyone who is interested in DevOps, DevSecOps, Security Automation and Developers, system administrators. 


What should I bring with me? : Hardware: Laptop which can run two VMs simultaneously with at least 4 GB RAM and minimum 30 GB hard disk free space. Software:   1. Virtualbox, Vagrant, Ansible and Docker and AWS Free Tier Registration 2. More instructions will be sent via email to selected participants. 



Null humla champion: Mohammed A Imran ( @secfigo )  is senior security engineer at Zendesk and specializes in vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and static code analysis. He loves to build infosec communities, share his knowledge with the community and has organized around 60+ security events for the best null chapter, null Hyderabad in India. He now leads null Singapore chapter. When not at work, he likes to practice his design skills and fiddle with development frameworks.  


<a href="http://www.androidpentesting.com"></a> Please reach out to Humla champion, if you have any questions regarding the event.
events.group_name: Null Singapore - The Open Security Community
